Name: Removal of raccoons.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the removal of raccoons.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1.  Chapter one of title 17 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 17-192 to read as follows:
§17-192 Raccoon removal. a. The department shall ensure the prompt removal of any raccoon from any outdoor public and private property upon receiving a request for such removal from a member of the public.
b. The department shall promulgate such rules as may be necessary to implement the provisions of this section.
§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.

AS
LS # 1717
December 1, 2006
